bibl.seg: WODZIŃSKA Anna, A Manual of Egyptian Pottery. Volume 4: Ptolemaic Period - Modern. (AERA Field Manual Series. 1, 4.)
Boston, Ancient Egypt Research Associates, 2010, 4°, x-350 pp., nombr. figg. et 16 pll. coul. ISBN 978-0-9825544-2-5. $50.
